question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions about your eating habits.
I deliberately take small helpings as a means of controlling my weight.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: When I feel anxious, I find myself eating.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: When I feel blue, I often overeat.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: When I feel lonely, I console myself by eating.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: I consciously hold back at meals in order not to weight gain.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: I do not eat some foods because they make me fat.
option_text: Definitely true,Mostly true,Mostly false, Definitely false

question_text: How frequently do you avoid "stocking up" on tempting foods?
How likely are you to consciously eat less than you want?

On a scale of 1 to 8, where 1 means no restraint in eating (eating whatever you want, whenever you want it) and 8 means total restraint (constantly limiting food intake and never "giving in"), what number would you give yourself?
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
